      • xa

        private boolean xa
        Type of data source to use. If true, use XADataSource; otherwise, use ConnectionPoolDataSource.

        Type of statement to use. If true, use CallableStatement; otherwise, use PreparedStatement.

      • testCloseEventOnClosedConnection

        public void testCloseEventOnClosedConnection()
                                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        Test whether a close event is raised when a connection is closed. (Client should raise a close event since the connection calls close() on its statements. Embedded should not raise a close event since the connection does not call close() on its statements.)
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if a database error occurs

      • testErrorEventOnClosedConnection

                                      throws java.sql.SQLException

        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if a database error occurs
